column4: I've got an Acer Extensa 4220 in front of me, the wireless doesn't work by default so I was looking for a Windows driver for NDIS but couldn't find anything on the list, not sure if I'm looking with the wrong things, or if it just won't work.

Oooh, madwifi, I didn't see sorry :P
